summary: Completed comprehensive testing of redesigned Laundry Express E-Commerce Platform. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% pass rate) with correct product catalog structure. Frontend core functionality works but authentication system has issues preventing login/registration.

ui_bugs.issue: Login form submission not working - admin credentials don't authenticate
ui_bugs.details: Admin login (admin@laundry-express.co.uk / admin123) works via API but fails in frontend form

ui_bugs.issue: Registration form has validation errors preventing account creation
ui_bugs.details: Form validation prevents successful registration despite filled fields

ui_bugs.issue: Cart navigation button click intercepted by overlay elements
ui_bugs.details: Same overlay interception issue from previous iteration persists

integration_issues.issue: Frontend authentication not integrating properly with backend APIs
integration_issues.impact: Users cannot login or register, blocking cart and checkout functionality

passed_tests: Pin code availability checker (CO27FQ, CO1, CO2 valid, INVALID rejected)
Products page with service type tabs (5 types: Dry Cleaning, Laundry, Wash & Iron, Ironing, Household & Bulk Laundry)
Collapsible category sections (Accessories, Bottoms, Tops, Dresses, Outerwear)
Product catalog display (39 products loaded correctly)
Admin API functionality (stats, orders, businesses, product creation)
Product structure with Service Type → Category → Products hierarchy
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication system - login and registration forms are not submitting properly despite backend APIs working correctly. Admin login (admin@laundry-express.co.uk / admin123) and user registration need to be fixed for full platform functionality.
